org.jcatapult.container
Interface ContainerResolver

All Known Implementing Classes:
ServletContainerResolver
public interface ContainerResolver

This interface determines path locations within the bounds of a container. The container might be a J2EE container or a scheduler or just a simple stand-alone JVM. This abstraction allows the application to find paths without depending directly on container objects like the ServletContext.

Method Summary
 String getRealPath(String path)
          Returns the location on the file system of the container based path.
 URL getResource(String path)
          Returns the URL to the given path.
 

Method Detail

getRealPath

String getRealPath(String path)
Returns the location on the file system of the container based path.

Parameters:
path - The path.
Returns:
The real path or null if the path could not be resolved.

getResource

URL getResource(String path)
Returns the URL to the given path. This is allows containers that use JAR files or similar archives to retrieve files without extracting them.

Parameters:
path - THe path to get the resource for.
Returns:
The resource URL or null if it couldn't be resolved.
